reviewText:
For those interested in these two great drive-in films, this release has been split up by Shout! Factory. Great Texas Dynamite Chase is already available as part of the Action Packed collection with George Peaches (starring Dirk Benedict) and Smokey Bites the Dust (with Jimmy McNichol).

Black Oak Conspiracy should be coming out this fall with Savage! At least that's the plan as of May.
